item.title: 0848 OXY
item.description: score:848 Chances: Occidental Petroleum recorded a daily gain, pushing its share price higher, indicating positive market sentiment. Permian Basin production remains strong, maintaining OXY’s production volumes for 2023, which may be viewed positively by investors. Occidental Petroleum Corp. demonstrated willingness to buy back Berkshire Hathaway Inc.
